item.description:
This event is open to all types of kayaks as well as canoes

Paddle the POW WOW River launching from Tuxbury Pond in Amesbury Ma. The put-in spot has limited parking but you can double up behind other cars in our group.

We'll paddle up the Pow Wow for about 3-4 miles then return to the put-in.
Bring a snack / lunch as well as water or other fluids to drink while paddling. Also it may be buggy so bug repellent would be a good idea and of course sunscreen.

Directions: to Put-In Launching location

• Take 495 South to Exit 54 Route 150 toward Amesbury
• Go ¼ mile and take a left onto Route 110 West
• After 1.1 miles you’ll see a sign on left “Simplicity/Merrow’s Inc. with an American flag. Take an almost immediate right onto Kimball Road. As soon as you see Simplicity/Merrow’s Inc. slow down and be prepared to turn right or you'll miss it.
• Go 2 miles and take a right onto Newton Road.
• Look for put-in on the left.

Life vests must be worn at all times when paddling with this group.

Wetsuits or drysuits recommended as the water temps are still quite cold

Google Maps Links below..

Tuxbury Pond/Pow Wow River Launch Site
item.name: Pow Wow River Paddle from Tuxbury Pond Amesbury MA
